meanings.definition: A two-wheeled vehicle with a motor.
meanings.sent1: I saw many motorcycles parked outside the store.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys riding motorcycles on the weekends.
meanings.sent3: The motorcycles lined up looked like a row of shiny toys.
meanings.sent4: The sound of motorcycles roaring down the street filled the air.
meanings.sent5: The motorcycles zoomed past, leaving a trail of dust behind.

meanings.definition: To ride or travel on a motorcycle.
meanings.sent1: She motorcycles to work every day, enjoying the fresh air.
meanings.sent2: They decided to motorcycles through the scenic countryside.
meanings.sent3: I tried to motorcycles, but I kept losing my balance comically.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts would motorcycles through his mind as he rode along.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of freedom when you motorcycles is unbeatable.
